overview: Here we have it folks, my tape of the BEST HITS, BEST GOALS, BEST SAVES, BEST BLOOPERS and all the rest of the action from last year in the NHL. Hey, what would my tape be without the odd disagreement. For a bonus, I'm going to pick my favourite goals, saves, hits, and my favourite disagreement of the past 10 years in the NHL. Blue and I know you're going to love this one!
tagline: Highlights from the 1997-98 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry.
title: Don Cherry 10th Anniversary
